title: PlayStation 5 Event Rescheduled! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.08.20
description:
Tim and Greg go through all the latest PlayStation 5, Xbox Lockheart, Cyberpunk 2077, EA, and Need for Speed rumors and updates. 

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:01:17 - Housekeeping
Nick’s TLOU Playthrough is on Youtube!
The Kinda Funny Showcase is back, but it’s called the Guerrilla Collective! We’ve teamed up with our friends at the Media Indie Exchange to do a three-day showcase featuring nearly 90 games! It all kicks off Saturday at 10 am PT on twitch!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Conner Nolan, Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:04:25 -  PS5 Event RESCHEDULED?
00:19:35 - Cyberpunk 2077 NOT on Stadia at Launch, Matt Purslow @IGN
00:22:51 - Xbox Lockhart Evidence Mounts, Francesco De Meo @ WCCF Tech
00:30:05 - What's the deal with Xcloud? We haven't heard much on awhile about it, and we still have no idea when its offically coming out. Have any of you try it out? - Best Friends Q:Zigerion
00:37:05 - PC Gaming Show Lineup Revealed, 50+ Games
00:40:00 - Need for Speed Heat adds Cross-Play, 1st to Do It, Michael McWhertor @ Polygon
00:42:00 - EA is finally going to start crossplay!...with Need For Speed Heat. Why - Best Friends Q:Frankfurtter
00:47:05 - EA extends free Xbox Series X upgrade offer for Madden NFL 21 after player complaints, Samit Sarkar @ Polygon
00:51:00 - Also, EA Play got delayed
00:51:55 - Out today
00:53:00 - Squad Up: Daniel(Xbox) - Prescherizer
00:58:15 - Will the PS5 mark a return for the primates or is Ape Escape done for good? - Big Kat
01:03:48 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:
Imran and Fran
